pkgmetadata.longdescription: Missing Data Imputation for Continuous and Categorical Data using Nonparametric Bayesian Joint Models // Missing data imputation for continuous and categorical data, using nonparametric Bayesian joint models (specifically the hierarchically coupled mixture model with local dependence described in Murray and Reiter (2015); see 'citation("MixedDataImpute")' or http://arxiv.org/abs/1410.0438). See '?hcmm_impute' for example usage.
